content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28, -61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -28, -61) with coal fuel
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5) moving items right
- Stone furnace at (-25, -59)
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5) moving items right
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates

### Secondary Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-18, -53)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18, -53) with coal fuel
- Wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5) moving items right
- Stone furnace at (-15, -51)
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5) moving items right
- Storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

### Coal Mining Setup at (41, -82)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 41, -82) with coal fuel
- Wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Power Generation Complex at (-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe networks for water and steam
- Electric network connecting various machines

### Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine 1 at (8.5, 13.5) crafting automation science packs
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5) containing automation science packs
- Burner inserters at (6.5, 13.5) and (10.5, 13.5) moving materials
- Connected by transport belt system

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Check if items exist in the target chest before attempting to extract
- Verify the chest inventory contents before extraction operations

### Errors when trying to insert items without having them
- Ensure required items are in inventory before attempting insertion
- Check inventory contents before insertion operations

### Research related errors
- Cannot research already completed technologies
- Verify research prerequisites and status before setting research

### Production errors
- Assembling machines show ingredient shortages when missing required materials
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Keep input chests stocked with necessary materials

### Resource management
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices
- Ensure continuous supply of coal for power generation and mining operations
